Package com.company

Class RMIServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • com.company.RMIServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InterfaceServer, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote
    public class RMIServer
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements InterfaceServer
    RMI Server class has all methods that can be called by the client makes requests to multicast with udp datagram packets
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • changeData

        public boolean changeData​(java.lang.String tableName,
                          java.lang.String columnType,
                          java.lang.Integer tableID,
                          java.lang.String newName)
                   throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        change data in database
        Specified by:
        changeData in interface InterfaceServer
        Parameters:
        tableName - type of data you want to change, can be artists, albums or musics
        columnType - type of data in each table, can be name or description
        tableID - id of each data, can be artistID, albumID, musicID
        newName - new data to add
        Returns:
        always false, no verification yet
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
